page.title: 15SIR JOHN COLFOX
page.content:
{Sir John Colfox}feels that the most important building in the village is the{church}because it is the oldest building.
Sir John, who owns over half of {Symondsbury,}has lived in the village for 61 years.
The live-stock on the land includes 4 {dairy herds,}700{sheep}and up to 3000 {pigs. }
Sir John, likes living in Symondsbury and if he didn't live there the alternative would be heaven or not as the case may be.
He is pleased about the way the village is running and he would not like to change it.
